title: "With a Chaos icon Equipped" - Does it count the icon for 280 Chaos coins aswell?
body:
I was just wondering... will it count if I use The chaos icon for 280 coins, for one of the quests that tells you to win one game while having a chaos icon equipped? (Instead of the icon you're giving for first mission)

If it doesn't... Then I think it should. 
I just unlocked the Icon and the Border by crafting it, and wouldn't want to switch to anything else at the moment.

replies.body: It does!  Per the [event page FAQ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/events/vs-2017), any icon pertaining to Chaos should work for you.  :D  Let me know if that clears things up!

Very nice, I did read a bit of the FAQ, but I guess I wasn't thorough- 
Thank you for clarification.
